entry.title: Under Pressure
entry.summary:
Author: Loric Bard (Chanonvic)

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 897Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: 22:45 - RED HOOD (Hood) arrives at Pier 11 at Gotham Harbor to intercept a delivery of three abducted teenagers [identities REDACTED]. Hood ignores protocol and moves in alone. Hood determines the health of the abductees and sends in a call for back up. NIGHTWING and RED ROBIN (RR) arrive. RR escorts the abductees to safety. Hood and Nightwing disguise themselves and hide in the freight container in the abductees' places. The container is loaded onto the passenger ship The Gentle Lady.23:00 - The Gentle Lady departs Gotham Harbor. Hood and Nightwing await an opportunity to apprehend the two abductors and crew. According to communications relay, Nightwing informed Hood of the countless risks being incurred due to Hood's decision to move in prior to calling in the case. Hood proceeds to utter a string of expletives that is unnecessary to repeat.---Red Hood and Nightwing accidentally get themselves abducted while saving a few victims. While on a sinking ship, it becomes clear to everybody how they feel.

entry.title: Together
entry.summary:
Author: GraveTiger

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,448Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 27

Summary: He's going to die.He’s dangling twenty feet in the air with no grapple line, hard stone floor, and not enough light to really make out where the floor even is. The only light is the reflective golden eyes staring up at him.He… is going to die…“Fuck…” Jason tries to not panic and tries to think of a way to maybe swing to a wall and then sort of scale his way down enough that his legs won’t break when he lands?“Fall.”The voice below jolts him, “What?” and he looks down at the eyes.Talon stares up at him, “Fall,” and holds his hands out.Aaahhhh… shiiiiiit…-----------In which Jason finds himself captured with a Talon...

entry.title: Paper Ducks | One Shot
entry.summary:
Author: Mat_Vibes

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,770Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 21

Summary: It all started with a giant penguin.Well, technically, it started with a Penguin warehouse, a trapdoor, a poorly timed pun, and Tim screaming, “Don’t touch that, Dick!” But the point was: the four of them were now stuck in what looked like a mix between a storage cellar and a very deranged villain’s toy box.Jason kicked the wall once and glared at the ceiling. “I told you this job felt too easy. It was a classic setup. Empty warehouse. No guards. One obviously suspicious penguin statue just sitting in the middle. And then this guy—” he pointed dramatically at Dick, “—decides to make a pun.”Dick crossed his arms and raised a brow. “It was a great pun. ‘Waddle we do now?’ It was thematic.” JayDickWeek 2025 Day 5: Reverse Robins | Trapped Together | 5+1 Things

entry.title: From Brothers to Lovers
entry.summary:
Author: RayByAnotherName

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,940Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 25

Summary: "One second you're calling me brother and the next you're asking if I want to have sex? Do you hear yourself?"Dick just laughed again, smiling wide. He ran a hand through his hair and Jason's throat bobbed as the dark strands fell forward again."The two are actually related," Dick chuckled, emphasizing the last word. He rocked forward onto the balls of his feet, "I've always had this... well, this fantasy..."Or... Dick has an incest kink, and Jason is about discovery he might as well. And sworn brothers is close enough right?Written for JayDick Week 2025 - Day 2: Incest Kink

entry.title: exitus acta probat
entry.summary:
Author: mooniv

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,858Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 31

Summary: When Red Hood explains there is only one thing he wants in exchange for stopping his cycle of destruction, it seems a little too easy. But Bruce is here on behalf of all the Gothamites who tremble from the schemes and bloodshed spilled by the man under the red mask.When that demand takes the shape of his son’s name, neatly written in the black ink of the contract put in front of him, Bruce has to refrain from tearing the paper in two on the spot.

entry.title: 'Til Truth Do Us Part
entry.summary:
Author: LesbianAlien

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,886Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 14

Summary: It's Gotham, but not as you know it.Bruce Wayne's vigilante family has long been at odds with Harvey Dent's mafia family, with Gotham often the victim of their bloody fighting. Through hard work, and heated discussions, eventually a truce was created to prove to Gotham that better times lay ahead - a truce that needed a true union to convince them all.That was how Dent's son and right hand man, Jason Todd, found himself standing at the altar facing his childhood rival, Wayne's first son and crime-fighting partner, Dick Grayson.Who knew 'peace' could be so annoying?-------------------------------------For Day 4 of Jaydick Week 2025. Chosen prompts: "Ooh you wanna to kiss me so bad" | Mafia/Mob Boss AU | Arranged Marriage

Author: Mat_Vibes

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,203Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 61

Summary: Dick’s fingers tightened around his glass.“Congratulations,” Marina said smoothly. “You’re already Gotham’s most powerful couple.”Jason let out a breath and leaned back. “Guess we’re stuck with each other, huh?”Dick looked at him, heart thudding slow and strange. “Guess so.”Jason tilted his head. “Ooh, you wanna kiss me so bad.”Dick rolled his eyes. “God, I hate you.” JayDickWeek 2025 Day 4: “Ooh you wanna kiss me so bad” | Mafia/Mob Boss AU | Arranged Marriage

entry.title: Nightwing fighting between armor and heart
entry.summary:
Author: locksandkeys

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,990Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 4

Summary: Seven years since the fight with Bane. Seven years since Richard Grayson, now the legendary Nightwing—Mage Knight of the Kingdom of El—kissed Jason Todd for the first and last time behind the castle walls.Now back from a pilgrimage of magic and mystery across ancient lands, Richard returns stronger, wiser, and more respected than ever. But no title, no spell, no armor forged in dragonfire can protect his heart from the ache of knowing the man he loves remains behind enchanted bars, imprisoned for a betrayal he has long since atoned for.Torn between duty to the kingdom and loyalty to his heart, Richard must walk the razor’s edge between honor and rebellion. As constellations dance in the night sky—silent messages across prison walls—an old flame threatens to reignite beneath layers of law, legacy, and longing.In a world where kings hold grudges and magic is both salvation and weapon, will Nightwing remain the champion of the people—or risk everything for love?

entry.title: a grave in the sky (where it's roomy to lie)
entry.summary:
Author: svalas

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,897Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 110

Summary: Nightwing stood up, and the expression on his face made Spoiler step back nervously. His hand unfurled, shaking, revealing a sharp and bloody switchblade. Its body was a beautiful red. A phoenix had been carved into the side. “Somebody was here.” If his voice went any tighter it might shatter. “And we were too late.” (Again, he added in his mind. Then he flinched and had to remind himself—not Jason. Jason’s dead. Just the Joker.) or, what might have happened in UTRH if Black Mask was just a bit smarter

entry.title: Knitted Love
entry.summary:
Author: redbirdandbluebird23

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,474Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 105

Summary: Jason finishes the scarf in two weeks. It's a little wonky and there's one or two holes somehow, but it's his. It's something he made with his bare hands - the first thing he's made rather than destroyed in a long time.Once the scarf is done, he goes round to Mrs Talis' again and learns how to make a baby blanket and bonnet for Lian. They take longer, but he's determined to do it, and even if they end up a little wonky too, the look on Roy's face when he hands them over is worth it.***Jason picks up knitting and gets more than he thought he would out of it.JayDick Week 2025 Day 3: Childhood crush
